name: Extension King Hair Salon
overview: Extension King is a full-service hair salon, specializing in the best quality human hair extensions and luxurious hair coloring by Goldwell and Inoa. EK is not only a hair salon but a speciality hair extension beauty supply, featuring Bohyme Hair the finest quality remy human hair in the market today. They carry a full range of clip-in hair extensions (up to 24”) and the best hair care products, made especially for hair extensions. Services include, Extension King’s signature technique called the EZ Weft method, which can only be found at Extension King. In this method hand tied wefts are tied in the hair via a silicon ring without braiding. Virtually replaces the sew-in technique, making the EZ Weft faster and lighter on the hair. Currently, our extensions can be found in Russian Vouge, Harper’s Bazaar and Elle magazines.
